143.title: Road to El Dorado

1431.content: What sort of vore will happen?
1431.title: Miguel and Tulio

14311.content:
Miguel and Tulio had been venturing through the strange jungle for days atop their nobly stolen steed, Altivo. Miguel was ever the optimist and even Tulio, after seeing how many land marks lined up perfectly with the map, was starting to come around. The pair eventually came upon a carved stone in front of a waterfall; the last marker on the map. However, there was no El Dorado, no city of gold. Tulio was infuriated that they’d wasted their time and insisted that they should just get going.

However, as if by fate, at that exact moment a group of dark skinned natives emerged from the waterfall. In the lead was a woman who seemed to be struggling to escape. When the Spanish pair saw that she was being pursued by big men armed with spears, they tried to get Altivo to run, but the horse panicked when the woman ran into him. She was in a state of fear, understandably, but was still a lovely thing with long black hair that reach down to her shapely hips, clothing that showed an ample amount of skin, and a luscious full figure.

Once they’d been surrounded, the men with spears said nothing, but motioned the trio and their animal to follow. They went behind the waterfall to reveal a dark cavern and a river. All boarded into boats and traveled a short distance. Those who thought themselves prisoners didn’t say a word with guard monitoring them. However, the Spanish pair did notice how said men would stare with greater interest at them, only to turn away when caught. Maybe they were just intrigued by the newcomers. That seemed logical, although the con artist pair sensed that there was more to it.

Eventually the boats came out into the open and the Spanish pair was left in awe. El Dorado – for there was nothing else they could call it – was everything they’d ever dreamed and more. Temples as tall as castles sparkled with golden light. Even lesser buildings made of stone and clay had a fondness for gold trimming. Now that they were out of the waterfall’s fog, it was also clear that gold was a favorite jewelry for the people with most wearing gold necklaces or earrings. The people took just as much interest in the newcomers, if not more so. All gathered along the water’s edge to get a look at these two who bore a remarkable resemblance to images carved on their holy walls. The girl, when noticed, was regarded with scorn for her blasphemous desecration, which she still cradled in her arms.

Upon docking, the prisoners were made to disembark. The Spanish duo mounted their horse while the girl trailed behind them. Then, as they were coming to terms with what would surely be their doom, both were surprised when an important looking native began to speak… and they understood him.

“Behold! As the prophecies foretold. The time of judgement is now!” he said while gesturing dramatically as a fat man came up beside him, also looking very important. The first man continued and descended the stares to approach the ‘prisoners’. “Citizens! Did I not predict that the gods would come to us?”

Miguel and Tulio were natural con artists. It had been their trade for most of their lives. Upon hearing the murmurs of the crowd and seeing where all eyes were focused, it didn’t take long for them to read the room and concoct a scheme.

“My lords,” greeted the first man with gracious enthusiasm. “I am Tzekel-Kan, your devoted high priest, and speaker for the gods.”

“I am Chief Tannabok,” introduced the fat man wearing a golden crown. “What names may we call you?”

Introductions followed with Miguel and Tulio adopting regal poses and trying to sound authoritative. That seemed to please the audience. Then Tzekel-Kan grabbed the woman by the wrist, calling her a temple robbing thief, and asked the ‘gods’ how she should be punished.

“No-no, my lords,” she begged. “See, th-the gods sent me a vision to bring them tribute to the temple to guide them here. My only wish is to serve the gods.” She bowed her head in submission, but also shot a pleading look to the Spanish duo. And with even Tzekel-Kan looking at them, it was evident that they had this woman’s life in her hands.

What will they do? Will they have her released to follow a similar dynamic as in the movie? Or will they keep her as their servant?
14311.title: The Gods Have Come to Us

choices: Tulio and Miguel are shown to the temple
143111.content:
After a lengthy pause, Tulio spoke in a voice of such absolute authority that even Miguel was impressed. "Release her."

Tzekel-Kan looked annoyed but released the thief at once. The priest shoved the thing the thief had been holding back into her arms. Now that Miguel had a better look at it, the object that had been stolen looked to be a golden head, probably belonging to a statue.

"Make sure you return this to the temple," sneered Tzekel-Kan, shoving the female thief roughly out of the way. The thief stumbled for a few steps but managed to remain on her feet. As she walked away, both Tulio and Miguel noticed the way the hips of the thief swayed back and forth. If Tzekel-Kan or the chief noticed this, they chose to ignore it. Tzekel-Kan looked to be too busy glaring at the retreating female thief.

"My lords. I am Chief Tannabok," he introduced himself. “What names may we call you?”

“I am Miguel" said Miguel in a bold voice.

"And I am Tulio" said Tulio.

There were murmurs around the audience surrounding them.

"My lords, how long do you intend to stay in El Dorado?"

Tzekel-Kan turned sharply around and rolled his eyes. Before Miguel and Tulio could respond, the priest spoke. "Enough! You do not ask the gods such questions!" said Tzekel-Kan shoving Tannabok as hard as he could.

Realizing his folly, Tannabok humbly bowed his head. “I apologize, my lords. Might we show you to your temple?"

“Or would you prefer to show us your power?" asked Tzekel-Kan. "As proof of your divinity? We are all eager to witness your wondrous powers."

"Divinity.... right," said Tulio. The Spanish man gave a nervous laugh. "Give us a moment".

Tulio and Miguel walked a few feet away. The two gods were having a quiet conversation that Tzekel-Kan and Tannabok couldn't hear. As the conversation continued, the nearby volcano started to rumble ominously. This naturally grew the attention of the entire population of the city, save for the two gods having a discussion of all things. At one point, the one named Miguel was softly hitting Tulio with his open palm while the other had his eyes tightly closed. Tannabok and Tzekel-Kan exchanged bewildered glances.

"Stop!" yelled Tulio in a commanding voice that echoed across the city.

The volcano had been about ready to erupt when it suddenly stopped. Everyone in the crowd gasped at this occurrence and immediately prostrated themselves.
Tulio and Miguel had finally noticed what was happening and opened their arms to bask in the reverence.

"Don't make us start it up again" said Miguel when a guard tried standing. "Because we will."
143111.title: The First of many miracles

choices: Grab it knowing it may take a few moments
Leave it not wanting to anger the stranger any more
Refuse to go anywhere until you know more
1432.content:
You reach down and grasp onto the boy's hand. He looks at his sister and reaches for help before tripping. You proceed pulling the sight of the tank looming closer and manage your way inside the small door.
"Let go" The young boy cries at you his arm aching and legs covered in mud. You ignore his demand and pull him inside as the walls begin to shake. The man you have seen before slams the doorway shut quickly then looks at you with a vivid expression of rage. The door is thrust open before a slurry of stained dirt comes tumbling in sealing any resemblance of a passage way. You hunch down in the narrow tunnel a wooden pilar pressing against your shoulder. The sight of a cluster of flickering lights hanging off of bracing draws your attention before the tunnel turns. You glance down at the young boy who stares at the pile where the door use to be and try to muster a response.
"What the hell were you thinking?" The man screams cutting your thought of remorse.
"I just thought that..." You say looking down at the boy as his eyes begin to well up with tears.
"You didn't think; do you have any idea? What will happen if they locate us" The man asks then looks down at the boy and sighs? The man looks around and begins walking away from you mumbling to himself.
You shove the boy ahead of you towards the man, and he follows. He quickly becomes silent except a few whimper as he walks. Covering up your nakedness you have many questions running through your head. Not knowing where you're going of how you got here. Why people were shooting and so on. You walk forward before being stopped by the feeling of something sharp as it dives into your foot. You screech out involuntarily pulling your foot up the sound radiating off of the walls. The man glares back at you as he stops.
"Be careful where you step, and hurry up, were not the only ones moving through these passages" He utters descending further down into the tunnel the boy walking behind as if he was told. Pulling your foot up you see a shard of metal exposed within your footprint as it shimmers off the lights above.
"Hurry up" The man shouts before turning down the tunnel, his and the boys shadows dancing off the wall.
You look down at the shard then.
1432.title: The Passageway

14321.content:
Primary Objective: Avoid injury, Find safe shelter
Secondary Objective: Get clothed
Bonus: Discover a way to end the fighting

You drop to your knees and briskly scratch at the object through the mud. Drawing at it tightly you suddenly feel it break loose and find the remains of a broken blade as you wipe the mud free.
"Well look at what we have here." A man says a few feet away. In all the confusion, you did not even notice him. Looking up you notice that he is clothed in soldiery fatigues like the man with the boy yet there is a flint in his eye that he is not looking forward to helping you.
"You should know better than to hang around these caverns alone. There are threatening people about." He says looming over you before snatching you up by your hair and pushing you against the wall of the cavern. You try to scream out but are deadened as his hand comes hard against your face. You feel him fumbling with his belt as his other hand now pushes against your neck. Your hand tightens around the blade involuntary and the pain it causes reminds you of its existence.
Without a second thought, you strike the blade forward sending it into the mans side. He lurches sideways catching his balance and begins reaching for a gun within the holster at his side.
14321.title: Threatening people about

choices: Go towards the man with the boy
143212.content: You move over quickly noticing as he brings the gun from the holster and swoop the knife across his neck. He gurgles out protest and falls to his knees. His eyes stare up at you in a blank expression until he slams down face forward in the dirt. You look around the cavern and at the man. Turning him over you feel the warm blood still gushing over his neck as you unbutton his shirt. The belt is pulled free and then the boots before finally the pants are slipped off the now corpse. You quickly pull on the pants and slip your bare feet into the boots your reluctant because of all the blood but slip on the shirt feeling the warm blood stick to your breast. You slip the belt through the pants feeling as the supplies inside and on the belt hang off your frame then look down the hallway.
143212.title: Clothes

1453.content:
Keera, age 24. Land: Obnase. Awaking in a batch of one, a brown haired Asian girl has found herself on a small blanket in the center of a grass hut. It has been 30 years since the last Awakening and the once peaceful tribes of this land have erupted into civil war. No one knows who fired the first arrow. The only thing for certain is that Keera has appeared exactly on the 30th anniversary of the previous Awakening. Keera is the only one of her ethnicity in a fairly homogenous (South American) society.
         Megan, age 26. Land: Baldram. She has wide hips, blue eyes, brown hair, but what makes her stand out most is her height. She’s just south of 9ft tall and has a killer figure. To the best of her knowledge, her only other associates are a normal sized 16 year old boy and a normal sized 17 year old girl, whom she loves very much. They live together in a luxury cabin in the middle of a tropical jungle with plenty of fruit, easy to catch animals, few visible predators, electricity, and all the time in the world to spend with one another. Further, Megan has other notable traits besides her height.
1453.title: Asian Or Amazon

14532.content:
Primary Objective: Ensure that no one is killed by local predators. Survive for 2 years.
Secondary Objective: Discover the true cause of Megan’s problems.
Bonus: Stop the predators once and for all.

Do we begin at the beginning, or 6 months later.
14532.title: Super Hot Amazon Named Megan

145321.content:
The forest was alive with noon songs. The insects chirped and birds tweeted from the tops of the rustling trees. The last remnants of the morning dew fell from the tips of leaves down to the forest floor. The grass shook as animals of all shapes and sizes stalked, scurried, and foraged. The gentle lapping of a nearby stream flowed into a nearby pond filled with the croaking of rainbow frogs. Even the fish of the stream released bubbles from their lips as if to add to the chorus of the forest’s ode to life.
         The great, golden sun shined its rays upon a grateful figure who welcomed the warmth. The figure also welcomed the rays’ revealing qualities as they showed a still distortion in the tall grass. The contorted shape of a moderately sized being lay upon the forest floor.
         As the mysterious figure approached with the utmost stealth, not wanting to alert any unwelcome predators, the large figure took the time to examine the person in the grass. The being appeared to be in its late teens and just over five feet tall. An exact measurement was difficult due to it being contorted in a fetal position. The being had short brown hair, a well toned figure, and a limp extremity hanging from between its legs.
         The mysterious figure might have continued to examine the boy, were it not for his stirrings. Gently swinging his arm over, the boy narrowly avoided contact with the mysterious figure, which cautiously pulled back. As the boy tossed it’s head from side to side, the mysterious figure knew that he was waking up. It knew it had to act quickly to avoid being seen.
         Will it be seen?
145321.title: The Beginning

choices: They flee the unknown intruders and head north into the swamp.
They go south seeking refuge in the city only to be hunted.
145322.content:
Megan stared across the table and smiled as her two guests happily ate the meal she had both caught and prepared for them. She enjoyed their company, since she had been completely alone until she found them wandering helplessly in her part of the jungle. When she found them they were without shelter during a powerful thunderstorm and looked like they haven't eaten in days, she has taken care of them ever since. They were lucky that it was her that found them and not a big cat or poisonous snake. They also happened to be in the relatively safe part of the jungle that Megan called home.

Neighboring this oasis of safety was a hostile world. To the south the jungle grows denser and is populated with predators, until the jungle suddenly stops and massive metal and glass structures climb into the sky, she knew the area was populated because the spires would light up at night from electric lights, like the ones in her home, but because of a gut feeling of dread and the alien look of the buildings she stayed away. To the north was a different matter. After a weeks journey through a inhospitable swamp the jungle was filled with an evil amazon tribe, that would kidnap any that dared enter their land, or so Megan had seen.

What she had also seen was that the hunters of the amazon tribe were only 6 feet tall at best, suggesting that Megan was the tallest person in the land at 9 feet high. Megan also saw that the amazons wore animal skins around their chests and over their pelvic areas, as opposed to herself, Kate, and Mark lacking any such fabrics to cover themselves.

In these last months she has learned much about her guests, they were both barely adults with Kate just a year older than Mark. Kate was like Megan in having dark hair and deep blue eyes, though being much smaller and standing only 5 and a half feet tall. Kate looked up to Megan wanting to be as strong and independent as the amazon and hardly left her side. Her brother, as Kate referred to him, was taller than Kate and had short black hair, though having only seen a few Amazons, the first thing Megan noticed was that Mark was unlike herself and Kate. She later concluded that there were probably other males like him in the city to the south, and that there wouldn't be any in the amazon ruled jungle, although she still couldn't figure out what males were for.

Megan stared of into space at the table, reflecting on the time the three had spent together, fishing, hunting, teaching them how to survive, and just staring up at the night sky looking at the stars. She is suddenly brought back into reality by a loud bang in the distance. Megan ran out of the cabin and onto the deck and scanned the horizon to the south. the sky was lit up with fire and columns of smoke towered into the sky. After a few moments another bang echoed through the jungle and another fire appeared, this one closer than the last. As the night went on the sound of explosions and fleeing animals filled the air, and the fires grew closer. Megan held Kate and Mark close as the two watched the inferno.

Kate looked up to Megan and in a confused voice asked, "What's going on? What's causing all this?"

"I think it's the people to the south, clearing the area to expand were going to have to leave the area it won't be safe for much longer. The only question is where should we go." Megan said as she carefully considered her options.
145322.title: Six Months Later

choices: A unnaturally large panther pounces on the group.
The group is being stalked by a humanoid in a full environmental protection sui
1453221.content:
"Garb your spears and meet me out front we need to leave before they get here." Megan said as she scanned the horizon once more before leaving the deck.

Kate grabbed her spear and ran to the front room of the cabin with Megan and waited for Mark. "So where are we going to go?" Kate asks obviously frightened by the situation.

Megan grabs Kate and pulls her close, her head barely reaching half way up Megan's chest. Megan embraced Kate tightly and comforted her. "Stay calm Kate, if you lose your nerve you won't make it far. We're going to follow the animals' lead and head north, then look for a new home after we cross the swamp. This is dangerous territory so I need you to stay strong for me."

Kate stared into Megan's deep blue eyes and was filled with hope from the confidence in the amazon's expression. " I'll be strong for you." Kate said, the fear in her voice now replaced admiration.

The two women break their embrace just as Mark enters the room. Megan motions towards the door and they take the first steeps of their long journey. Outside they are greeted by a completely different world. Smoke clouds their vision, with what little they can see tinted in a red hue from the fires. The peaceful sound of birds now replaced by the screaming and growling of animals and an metallic inhuman screech growing louder. Megan lead the group away from the fire, walking at first then frantic sprinting as the screech grew closer and closer. Moving north was difficult with no cleared path the group was forced to push through dense jungle, resulting in minor bruises and cuts on their bare skin. After clearing a few miles of rough terrain and climbing a steep hill the group turn around and and look at their former home. Near the cleared land, that the cabin was built on, the tip of a metal object could be seen above the tree line. The object slowly walked into the clearance, each step causing the earth to shake slightly. The object now stood exposed, A large spherical body held up by six large spider like legs, a portion of the sphere opened revealing a large blue crystal. The crystal glowed bright and in a flash a red beam of light appeared and scorched the earth everywhere it touched. The group watches in awe as their home is devoured by fire. They were so entranced that they failed to notice as a large figure slowly creep towards them.
1453221.title: They flee the unknown intruders and head north...

14532211.content:
As the group watched the mechanical being burn the jungle, a large black panther watched them from the shadows. Megan had unknowingly lead the group straight into the panther's territory. Unlike the other animals this predator held its ground against the advancing threat, and considered the group's trespassing an act of aggression. It moved slowly and silently until it was within striking range. Letting out a low growl the panther pounced. Megan heard the growl and turned around, and she saw the beast leaping through the air towards Mark, with little time to act Megan was able to knock Mark out of the way. Mark was now safe, however Megan was now in the panther's path. Megan hit the ground with a loud thud, as her vision focused she saw the beast's massive maw lowering towards her. Megan quickly jabs the wooden shaft of her spear on the panther's neck to keep its razor sharp teeth away.

Adrenaline pumped through Kate as she watched the powerful amazon struggle underneath the panther's weight. Kate let out a roar of primal fury and ran to Megan's aid, driving her spear into the panther's neck. The panther recoiled in pain, giving Megan an opening to kick the colossal beast off her. The panther cried out in pain before returning to its feet and darting away. Now standing in clear sight for the first time the group saw the behemoth in all it glory, standing as tall as Megan showing teeth that could easily be larger than a normal man's face. Megan picked herself up off the ground just as the panther circled around readying itself for another attack. The beast jumped through the air once more, but this time Megan was prepared, she dropped to one knee and thrust her spear forward causing the beast to impale itself. The spear drove straight through the panther's chest striking the heart and killing it immediately.

"Megan are you alright?" Mark asked as he ran to help her up.

"Yes, I'm fine thanks to Kate, she is turning into quite the amazon." Megan said while smiling at Kate.

Kate's face turns red and she averts her eyes away from Megan. "... I... just didn't want you to get hurt."

After dusting herself off, Megan once more leads the group north wanting to stay as far away from whatever the machines from the south. The next few days pass without incident, but as they reach the border of the swamplands they come across the remains of a camp site. The fire pit is cold and empty, only one tent stands, wrecked though it may be, yet marks on the ground indicate more tents once stood, the most disturbing image however is the drag marks and trail of dry blood that start from the wrecked tent.

"What happened here?" Mark asked as he raised his spear.

Megan held her spear tight and slowly followed the trail of blood. " I'm not sure just be rea...... oh my god." Megan finished. At the end of the drag marks the half eaten carcass of a man laid on the ground still rotting, tightly clenching a book in its hands.

Kate puts her hand over her mouth in disgust, but overcomes the gruesome sight and retrieves the book. "It's a diary, detailing a trip into a cave down the road." Megan said while pointing then began reading from the last entries in the book. " Day five and we're still lost, we thought this could be a safe route past the marsh of the dead, but its a damn labyrinth down here and I fear we are going in circles. Took make matters worse some of the guys are losing their grip on reality, claiming to see a monster stalking us its probably just the near black lighting playing tricks on overactive imaginations. Day six, We should leave, we should turn back and exit the way we came in, but something is drawing me in, A voice in the back of my head calling to me from the center of this maze. I'm seeing it now too and hearing a growl, It's watching us waiting for a moment to strike. I shouldn't be taking my eyes away from the shadows even to write, but I find it is the only thing that can calm my nerves. Day seven, oh god oh god, their dead all of them, I know it. It sprang from the shadows and started to rip us apart, and ... and I ran, I just left them. The only thing keeping me going is a light in the distance I must reach it. Day eight, I've made it out, I'm safe now. However it's as I feared I came out the way we entered, and whats worse I can still feel that thing's eye burning into my soul, watching me, waiting. " At this point Kate looks up with a grim look and said " This next part is written in his own blood....., It followed me out, and started to eat me alive, before leaving me to die a slow painful death. I write this now as a warning to all that may find this, if you go into it's lair it will never stop hunting you... Abandon hope all ye who enter here."

"The marsh of the dead, that's what the swamp is called! So are choices are this swamp of the dead or, from how that book describes it, the gates of hell, that's just wonderful." Mark says hysterically.

After seeing the gruesome corpse Megan wanted nothing to do with the cave, but just like the dead man, a voice in her head beckoned her to enter.
14532211.title: A unnaturally large panther pounces on the gro...

choices: A spear held by an Amazon.
145322111.content:
Megan placed her hand on Mark's shoulder and said, "Don't worry the swamp is dangerous, but it's nothing like this". Megan takes one last look at the body, before leading everyone away from the cave and towards the marshland. As they get closer to the swamp, the jungle becomes less dense until it reaches the point where the only vegetation is patches of tall grass and everything became silent after they reached the border of the swamp. Fog clouded their vision, but from what they could see showed how inhospitable the landscape was. The water was murky and near black, and it was devoid of life, with the exception of plants Megan recognized as poisonous. Megan walks into the murky water and continues forward with ease, but for Mark and Kate the water reached their waists. Mark kept his spear ready to strike, and attempted to scan the water as he moves.

"I don't like this the fog is limiting our visibility and the water is to dark to see into. Anything could be out here." Mark said quietly in case anything dangerous was near by.

"No I've crossed this swamp before nothing lives here. The swamp's water is toxic if you drink it, so there are no crocodiles, panthers or anything else out here. Are biggest danger here is dehydration so speed is more important than defense here." Megan said before picking up her pace. Mark lowered his spear and speed up to keep up with Megan.

"So when did you come through here Megan, I mean you haven't left our side since you found us. How long ago was it?" Kate asked as she speed up so that she could walk side by side with Megan.

"I'm not sure exactly when, but it was as far back as I could remember. I just woke up remembering barely anything, I only knew my name and that I wasn't always like this." Megan said motioning to her body.

"So you didn't always have that amazing amazon body." Kate said shortly before turning red, realizing how her statement could be interpreted.

Megan looked down at her young companion and smiled innocently before continuing her story. "No, but I'm not sure what changed me. Then shortly after gaining consciousness I was hunted through the jungle by other amazons. They finally stopped chasing me when I reached the swamp".

The group presses forward as Megan details how she crossed the marsh, explored the jungle and, built her home. Three days have passed and the three continued to struggle forward despite their lack drinkable water. At this point even the disgusting, black, murky water seemed welcoming, the only thing holding the group back was the knowledge that drinking it would cause an agonizing death. The thirst had lead to conflict in the group, Mark having grown angry at the situation blamed Megan for taking them into the swamp. Kate stood up for Megan leading to the two to grow distant and causing the group to continue in tense silence. As the group approached a sandbar Mark saw something small dart through the water and over a near by hill. "I just saw something over there." Mark said raising his spear," if we catch it it will help us a little." Megan and Kate nodded and followed Mark over the hill on the sandbar. As the three cleared the top of the hill they moved right into a pool of quicksand, and were quickly pulled in up to their chests. The three struggled but they soon realized they couldn't get free on their own. Then when the group seems to have lost all hope, a wooden object is lowered to their arms. One by one they grab on and are pulled out, Megan looks up at their savior and sees that the wooded stick was.
145322111.title: Water, water everywhere.

14533.content: Jerry, age 17. Land: Mog. He is a mediocre teenager from multiple nationalities. Jerry awakes along with a group of what appears to be eight others, but there are likely more. Mog is set in a 21st century suburban district, complete with stores, houses, a couple of parks, and thousands of dead bodies. The streets and even many of the buildings are filled with week old corpses. There are no obvious signs of conflict (aside from panicking masses) or building damage, but there is little doubt that whatever force responsible for the deaths of these people may still be lurking in the shadows.
14533.title: Maybe a Post Apocalyptic Place

The world consists of a fairly large sized high school surrounded by about twenty suburban homes. One year prior to the arrival of the new Residents there was an Awakening of approximately 300 humans that range in age from eight to sixteen. Girls make up a minority of this group. The situation of this world is on the verge of meeting Lord of the Flies.

1453321.content:
Primary Objective: Establish a new chain of command.
Secondary Objective: Set yourself as leader.
Bonus: Kill/Save Someone



So you want to be a new kid.
Dude or Duddet?
After this you can be whatever you want.
1453321.title: The New Kid

choices: John is caught in the storm.
1453322.content:
John Lazarus, a strong young man with short black hair, opened his eyes, revealing their gentle blue color to find that he had awakened in a place he did not recognize. It was morning and he was resting on a low cliff, over looking a fertile valley, devoid of any human life.

"Where am I?" he asked himself.

John with the heart of an adventurer and the mind of an explorer looked about for a moment then searched his memory, trying to retrace his steps to determined how he came to be there but nothing came to mind, it was all a blank, as if everything before this day did not exist. Trying not to panic, he searched for his pockets to find he did not have any, he was wearing very simple clothing, made up of animal skins.

"Well, this is problem." he thought, looking around again.

He looked up to a rumbling sound and found that a storm was brewing in the far distance, he would have to find shelter before the storm reached him, otherwise, he would be in for a worse day than he woke up to.

"I better get moving." said John, working his way off the small cliff. "I'm not going to find any answers standing around."
he sighed, walking towards the valley. "There's bound to be clues around somewhere that will tell me where I am." he assured himself. "I just have to keep my eyes open."

With that, John walked off, into his new surroundings, using only what seemed right in respects of survival to find some shelter before the storm...
1453322.title: John Lazarus

14533221.content:
Coming across a few fallen trees, John saw a potential shelter. Without really thinking about it, he looked about, finding some lengths of sturdy vine and used them to tie the narrow trees closer together to form a roof for a lean to. He then lifted the three fallen trees with his back, just enough, to get them onto two large stumps close by.

"That should do it." he said to himself. "Now for some dry grass and some wood before that storm hits so I don't freeze my butt off tonight."

Gathering the grass and, twigs, and small branches that were lying about, John got back to the lean to, just in time to beat the rain as it began to come down in buckets. John then an old trick of rubbing sticks together to make a small fire, again without really thinking about it. Thunder rumbled overhead as John laid down next to the small fire, thankful that he was able to find shelter in time.

"Tomorrow, I will have to find some food and water." he said to himself. "Otherwise, I am not going to last long in this strange place, where ever it is."

John watched the storm rage overhead and got the idea of catching some of the water but he had no idea how he was going to do it...
14533221.title: John finds/makes shelter in time.

151112.title: Pony Unbirth

1511121.content:
Among the myriad races and species of the world, the ponies of Equestria, along with all of their close cousins on the phylogenetic tree (kirin, hippogriffs/seaponies, changelings, breezies, etc.) share a peculiar trait that, for some, would be considered either highly arousing or highly disturbing.

Namely, the ability of their females to somehow completely engulf another with their nethers and store them safely within their wombs. Yes, even the small ones.

Such an ability has been known to have been used offensively, for protection, for serving justice, for recreational or pleasurable purposes, and a plethora of other uses.

It is possible for a mare to regress any creature contained inside her uterus all the way back to the ovum state and store them inside the ovaries, though this practice is somewhat rare and not particularly well-known.

The main type of pony we will be using for this story is:
1511121.title: Pony Unbirth

Ponies are normal sized, humans are small

15111323.title: Big enough they can hold you in one hand (50 feet)

1511134.content:
1. Due to a cosmic event bringing the universes very close together, random portals have begun opening in different places around the world, sucking people in and dumping them into Equestria at a greatly reduced size. Many denizens of Equestria are surprised by this sudden development but are quick to help/take advantage of the stranded humans. You are a human male who gets pulled into a portal and sent into the home of a pony and has to survive until you can find some help.

2. Humans were once bigger like ponies and lived in a separated kingdom next to Equestria, they were essentially the elves and dwarves of the world for their intellect, mastery of magic, and craft-making but one day, a curse befell the entire species turning them about 4 inches high. When Humanity became cursed, a group of humans sought to become scavengers in the giants' societies and return to their small dwellings with the food and supplies. Over the centuries, these scavengers became Borrowers as they began living within the houses of the giants' equines without them noticing.

Until one day, they were discovered. However, because of Pony society being new and pretty welcoming to foreigners, they understood their plight and allowed them to live beside them. Living in harmony in a symbiotic relationship over the passing centuries, the Borrowers work on jobs and complete tasks usually not possible for ponies but possible for their small and practical size in exchange for living space, supplies, and food although some still do live on those unaware that belief doesn't have any Borrower in their home.

3. One day, hundred of giant portals opened simultaneously and hordes of ponies began pouring out, seeking to abduct as many noncombative human men and children as possible and take them back to their home plane. This is at the forefront of a massive invasion with the goal of correcting a perceived egregious error in the treatment of men by human women (which is not completely unwarranted), to "rebalance the scales", so to speak. Even though the society would be ostensibly run by mares it would not at all lessen the status of human men, nor would they be reduced to slavery. In fact, I think it likely they will be coddled and pampered by their new governors. The transition will be quick and quiet, with many waking up in the morning to find that the world they thought they knew had suddenly and irrevocably changed. Some may not even realize it even then.

Women will be allowed the same rights as men so long as they abide by the new rules, and the ideology of "Feminism" while being on the surface similar to their own is completely incompatible with Equestrian sensibilities and will be quickly stamped out, and any of them who try to resist or make trouble will find themselves entrapped in a fate... most unpleasant.

choices: While Max is in the stomach...
Gwen tries to eat a kid
1552121.content:
Camp Campbell was a special kind of place. It was the kind of place that should be shut down for hundreds of laws it’s broken, from tax fraud to animal-related terrorism. It was the kind of place where bad parents that didn’t know how to tie their own shoes would send their kids. It was the kind of place where the inclusion of a masked serial killer would more likely improve the atmosphere of the camp. It was Camp Campbell, and if you’re there, we’re sorry.

“Alright campers, everyone back from their super fun nature walk?” The one asking the question was David, the Camp Campbell counselor who always tried to make camp fun and safe for everyone. He often failed. Behind him, trying to sleep against a tree was Gwen, another camp counselor who always tried not to be completely depressed about her crappy job. She often failed.

“Let’s see, is everyone here? Nurf, Preston, Nerris, Dolph, Neil, Maaaa…MAX!” David’s rollcall was stopped as he screamed out the name of the resident troublemaker, a small, tanned young man with black hair and an even blacker soul. The reason for David’s alarm had to do with a big, squirming gut on the young boy’s body that was most likely another camper. Max had devoured someone alive.

“Max, you know what I said about eating campers. It is strictly forbidden for any camper to devour another camper in any way shape or form,” David calmly explained like this was a conversation he had with Max a hundred times before, probably because he had. There were certain people in the world that could eat other people. They could do it safely or they could make it fatally with the person being digested alive. One of the only – ONLY – good things anyone could say about Camp Campbell was that they made it very hard for the campers to get eaten and digested. It helped that only three people present could eat people whole and that was Max, Gwen, and David.

“Shit. I thought you would be too stupid to notice my stomach,” Max grumbled, pissed at getting caught once again. He liked to eat people and thought a lot of the campers looked tasty. He wasn’t going to digest them, not all of them at least. He thought it was just so unfair. The one thing he wanted to do at the stupid camp and his most hated enemy – fucking David – was fucking stopping him.

“Well, I did notice. Now spit out whoever it is you ate,” David firmly, but also as kindly as he could, said as he patted Max hard on the back. Max tried to avoid regurgitating his meal, but David knew the exact spot to hit to get him to hurl. His mouth widened as a wet, naked form spilled forth from his insides and splattered on the ground. A disorientated but giddy Nikki stood up instantly, uncaring that she had been eaten or that she was buck naked.

“Nikki, go grab some clothes,” David said as the girl laughed and ran off, leaving the counselor to deal with the troublesome pred. David looked like he had a lecture ready, but instead, he just sighed and rubbed the bridge of his nose. “Max, why do you have to try and eat everyone? It’s dangerous and not very friendly. Vore should be a gentle, private thing that is shared willingly, and only done when you're fully mature.”

“Fuck your PC bullshit, David. I can eat people, you can eat people, and even Gwen can eat people, so why don’t we just do it? Vore isn’t some touchy-feely crap. Its power, its sex, and its awesome!” Max shot back, not willing to take this. He wasn’t some weak little boy afraid to be eaten. He ate people, and if he was able to he’d eat David. That would show him who was at the top of the food chain. Too bad he was just too God Damn Lanky!

“You’re entitled to your opinion, but I’m still going to have to punish you. You eat someone so you get eaten for an hour. Don’t worry, you’ll be nice and safe,” David assured the rather rude, violent, and very troubled boy as he patted him on the head. Max snarled at the counselor, not happy to be the one being devoured instead of devouring.

“Eat a dick, David.”

“Technically he’s about to,” Neil pointed out.

“Heh, a good one,” Gwen said as she seemed to finally be paying full attention again. Honestly, she was all for letting the kids eat each other and maybe eating a few herself. It was like the one benefit of being a camp counselor, getting your pick of the tasty campers. The rules said otherwise, and Gwen was worried she might lose her job if she was caught with a kid in her stomach, at least without some flimsy justification. Luckily, there was no rule about going out of camp occasionally and finding someone tasty to gobble up. It did mean leaving David to handle this Hellhole alone, but Gwen tried to make it up to him later.

“Now, now, let’s not make this even worse than it has to be. Max, I’m going to eat you now,” David said, reluctant to devour the young boy, but needing to. He always felt so uncomfortable eating Max, knowing deep down that Max was sensitive and needed his support, but this was the only way he would learn. Well, maybe there was another way. “Or I could sing you a song I’ve been working on.”

“No song. I’d rather be eaten than have to listen to another fucking camp song,” Max quickly said before David could pull out his guitar. David seemed disappointed and was about to argue about the healing benefits of music, when Max suddenly jumped up and dove into his mouth. Shoving his arms, head, and shoulders in to shut the counselor up. David stumbled back as he had Max sticking out of his mouth, the boy’s tiny legs kicking in the air. Grabbing his sides, David took a deep breath through his nose and started swallowing.

Max cringed as he felt the mouth around him surge back as he was swallowed. He hated this so fucking much. It was so tight and slimy, pressing in on his puny body in ways he really didn’t like. The undulating surroundings would gently massage him down, caressing every inch of him. It felt nice, which was exactly the reason he hated it so much. There was no way he’d ever enjoy being eaten by David, not that guy. Max grit his teeth as he felt himself getting taken in, David as always being careful as he lightly sucked on him and rolled his body around to get him nice and wet. It would have been better for both of them if Max was naked, but the boy refused to make anything easier for David, ever. He felt the young man gripping his legs firmly as he tilted his head back, taking in more of him with a solid gulp. David was a capable predator, with strong throat muscles, and a lot of give in his flesh, but he was still a pussy and that just pissed off Max even more. Max’s crotch entered the mouth, covered up but still feeling the heat and wetness of the maw. The kid bit his lip to keep from getting aroused, his stubbornness to remain hostile so strong. He’d get through this as miserably as possible.

Eating Max was easy for David, so easy he could have taken the boy down nearly instantly. However, it was important that he took his time and let Max get used to this so he wasn’t scared. He once told Gwen this. She rolled her eyes and called him a moron, which the sunny young man thought was very rude. David was nearly done with Max, only his little legs were left to swallow and he could feel the boy inches from slipping into his stomach. While this was about teaching Max a lesson, there was no doubt that there was something very addictive about the way he tasted. David wanted more, but he would control himself. He was a role model, after all. He hoped that one day Max saw this as what it was; an attempt to help him overcome his bad behavior and be happy like the counselor. With a final swallow, a large bulge traveled down David’s throat as he took in the last of Max. His gut expanded, slightly pushing up his shirt as the big, angry meal landed inside. David knew Max was fully settled when he felt him try to punch the stomach wall towards his heart with his tiny fist.

“Okay everyone, back to camp,” David said, smiling brightly as his big, round stomach wobbled. Inside him, Max seethed and plotted. He was going to get David one of these days and then they’d see who was inside whom. He’d make the sweet bastard pay for trying to make him act like a decent person.
1552121.title: Camp Camp Vore Vore

15521211.content:
The sun was setting over the lush brilliancy that was the third rate standards of Camp Campbell. It was dinner time, so everyone had gathered in the mess hall for the miserable excuse for dinner. The counselors ate separately from the campers, so as not to upset anyone, but Max had no such consideration as he shoveled down the small mountain of food. It was still the same crap everyone else got, but just in greater quantities befitting a predator. The campers were used to that, however. Yet all still gave him more space than usual, even the two people he hated the least.

“Alright, what’s going on here?”

“Can you not smell that?” griped Neil, his voice even more nasally than usual as he pinched his nostrils and fanned his hand. “Smells like the south end of a northbound cow.”

Nikki, finally dressed, took several tentative sniffs. “Hey, it does!” she cheered. Now that things had been recontextualized for her, she scooted closer to Max, who just rolled his eyes.

“That’s cuz I literally came out of David’s ASS!” he growled. “Stupid jerk ate me, shit me out, and told me to go clean myself off in the lake. Bastard even gave me a bar of soap that not only disintegrated the moment it touched the water, but it turned my clothes tie-dye. How the fuck does that work?”

“A few reasons,” Neil replied. “Most I’m pretty sure are illegal in this state. Still, at least you’ve got your spares.”

“Yeah, and now they’re gonna smell like shit until this stupid camp can get a decent bar of soap.” Miserably Max rested his cheek in his palm while his other hand popped what might have been a sausage in his mouth, though it tasted unsettlingly like broccoli. “I hate this stupid camp.”

“Ya knowww,” Nikki began as her head whimsically swayed. “Smelly clothes wouldn’t be such a big deal if this were a proper nature camp.”

“How do you figure?” Neil asked, wary of any ideas that came from the hyper girl.

“Well, nature sounds like naturalist, which is another word for nudist. If we went around naked all the time, we could just burn our clothes and frolic freely through the woods, just like mother Gaia intended.”

“Hippy garbage aside, that’s not a bad idea,” Max allowed.

“Seriously?” whined Neil.

“Seriously. The temperature’s pretty mild morning, noon, and night, we’d only need rain coats for rain, nudity is pretty liberating, and it saves me the trouble of stripping you people down before I eat you. So far I’m not seeing a downside.”

“Oh yeah?” questioned Neil authoritatively. “Did you forget about David?”

Max blinked. “I did, actually. Dammit. It was nice picturing a world without him around to always mess with my fun.”

“Pardon my intrusion,” boomed the deep voice of Quarter Master; real name, age, and possibly species all unknown. “But I couldn’t help but overhear your proposal for camp-wide nudity.”

“Yeah? What of it?” Max asked defensively.

“To carry out such a policy change, you’ll need signatures from all the campers’ parents, plus Cameron Campbell and at least two other camp staff.” QM produced an official looking petition to make the camp clothing optional, already complete with his and Cameron’s signatures.

“Uh, why do you have this?” Neil asked, backing away from the old man.

QM blinked and snorted. “To make this a reality, I suggest you work on your sales pitch for your fellow campers. Either that, or find someone who can forge some signatures.” He then set the petition down on the table and walked off without another word.

Max picked up the paper and read through the lines of big but manageable words. His face lit up with the almost alien expression of enthusiasm. “Alright! Finally something to make camp tolerable.”

“I’m still not sure,” Neil said. “I mean, this is Quarter Master we’re talking about. Even his signature is sketchy.” He pointed to the scratch marks on the page that looked like they’d been drawn with the man’s hook hand.

“Don’t be such a wet blanket, Neil,” urged Nikki. “Besides, its clothing optional. If you’re too chicken to show us you’re naked butt, then go right ahead and hide in the prison of clothing. As for me, I look forward to embracing the call of the wild!”

Max set a hand on Nikki’s shoulder. “Hold your horses there, girl. It says here we need signatures from all the parents. Hmm. How do we make this happen?”

Neil hummed thoughtfully. “Well, so long as this is only optional nudity, we could try breaking into the counselor’s cabin and finding our application forms. Those have our parent’s signatures.”

“Good thinking, Neil.” Max really must’ve been optimistic about this plan. He almost never complimented anyone. “So, who here’s got the least shitty handwriting?”

Nikki raised her hand. “Oh-oh. How about Dolf? He’s an artist. That’s basically the same thing, right?”

“Basically, yeah,” agreed Max, his grin growing, only to shrink again. “But even if we tricked him, we run the risk of the others complaining and getting things changed back to normal. I can’t believe I’m saying this, but Quarter Master’s right. We’ve got to convince everyone that this is for the best.”

Neil rolled his eyes. “Best for you two, maybe, but how are you going to convince everyone else. Space Kid never takes his suit off, and just about everyone else has some kind of weird attachment to some specific article of clothing, like Magic Kid’s hat.”

Max stroked his chin. “Space Kid we could probably convince that it’s just a new level of training, and Magic Kid only needs his hat and wand. We could say it’ll improve the trick if he literally has no sleeves to hide things in. Oh yeah! This is gonna happen!”

“Ered’s so cool, she’d look cool in anything, even her birthday suit,” swooned Nikki.

Max nodded. “Good angle. So we’ve got the parent signatures, we’re working on the campers’ compliance, so all we need is one other camp worker to make things happen.” Max’s smile finally fizzled. “David’s a bust. I can already hear his stupid lecture about comfort and maturity and bleh. Makes me sick just thinking about it, so I’m not even gonna bother. So how are we gonna sell this to Gwen?”

“She’s a pred, just like you,” Nikki reminded. “Maybe you can tell her that it’ll be like having her food already unwrapped? That sounds like something a pred would like.”

“It definitely is,” Max agreed, his good mood returning. “So we’ve got some base pitches going. Let’s work on them tonight, see what we come up with in the morning, and put our plan into motion to make Camp Campbell tolerable.”

“I was just gonna say better, but that works too,” agreed the ever chipper Nikki.

Neil shrugged. “Eh. We were due for another adventure anyway. This actually seems like it’s on the tamer side of things, so why not?”

Where do our rambunctious campers go from here?

Someone is skulking around the camp at night.

choices: The Mining Phantom is caught easily
15531.content:
The chemical plant was on the edge of a town called New Hampton. It once had been a mining town back in the late 1800s. Like all mining towns it died when the silver mines went dry. The Great Depression effectively killed it and the population had been dwindling ever since. New Hampton had a population of around 40,000 in its hayday. These days the population hovered around 2,000. There were a lot of abandoned buildings and condemned mining buildings and shafts.
New Hampton was haunted by a ghost known as the Mining Phantom that haunted a particular mine that was close to the old chemical plant that had been abandoned some 50 years prior due to mysterious circumstances. There were rumors about the reason why the chemical plant was closed but nobody knew the real reason.


A green van with the words "Mystery Machine" written on it was parked in the otherwise empty parking lot. There was no movement save for the trees that was waving in the breeze. It had been a high wind day where the wind decided to remain blowing at 20 mph with gusts sometimes exceeding 40 mph. Now that it was night the wind had died down considerably.

The two occupants of the van was a tall teenager by the name of Shaggy and a great dane known as Scooby Doo. The two had refused to enter the chemical plant while the others had went inside to search for the supposed phantom. The gang had only seen a brief glimpse of the Mining Phantom earlier in the day. The phantom was an old man with a long beard wrapped up in chains, armed with a wicked-looking pickaxe.

Shaggy sat in the front seat at the driving wheel while Scooby was seated next to him.

"See anything, Scoob?" asked Shaggy as he ate at a bag of Scooby Snacks.

The great dane was looking directly at the entrance to the plant perhaps 40 feet away. The entrance was lighted by a bare light bulb that was directly above the entrance. Apparently the abandoned plant still had electrical power. The plant was dark for the most part.

"Uhh uhh" grunted Scooby Doo shaking his head.

"It's been over a hour" said Shaggy, glancing at his watch. "Think the others are okay?"

Before Scooby could respond the Mining Phantom came into view. The Phantom was heading straight towards the entrance to the plant. Both Shaggy and Scooby ducked low trying not to be seen. Several moments went by.

Shaggy peeked over the dashboard to see the great double doors that served as the entrance to the plant were wide open.
Shaggy peered around the parking lot without leaving the van. There was no sign of the Mining Phantom.

"Like, I thought the Phantom was here already" said Shaggy. "Unless....the Phantom has a brother"

"Ragggy, look!" said Scoob pointing at a broken window at the far end of the plant. Shaggy had to squint his eyes to see that Velma was signaling for the pair to come inside.

"Well, here we go, Scoob" said Shaggy opening the door of the van. He walked to the passenger door and opened it. Scooby-Doo hesitated and then climbed out of the van. Scooby was clearly shaking in terror.

"Calm down will ya, Scoob?" asked Shaggy. The pair started to walk towards the entrance to the plant. "I know you're scared and so am I but you know the routine"

Scooby glanced up at Shaggy and sighed.

The two entered the chemical plant.
15531.title: Typical End of a Scooby-Doo episode

15532.content:
Primary Objective: Hunt, Make Contact With the People, and Survive for Ten Years
Secondary Objective: Make a Friend, Fight off a Threat
Bonus: Become a Leader

         The forest was unusually quiet that night. The beasts did not howl and the birds did not sing their night songs. In a sizable clearing about halfway between the northern-most village of Kadar and Mt Zen, a beam of light from the full moon shined upon Brage’s latest Resident.
         Local beasts looked out from their various shelters and stared in wonder at this great shining mass. Her movement was so subtle and her sounds so quiet that it wasn’t long before all manner of beasts moved into the clearing for a better look. Most of her body was covered in glistening scales, but atop her snake like coils rested the equally familiar shape of a human.
         A distant rustle in the brush caused the animals to scramble back for cover. A band of humans were moving through the forest. With an abundance of nocturnal dangers in Brage, there were only so many reasons for humans to travel at night and most weren’t exactly pleasant. In any case, their collective voices were causing the naga to stir.
         Who do you follow?

info.brief_description: Let's get crazy with some cartoon characters, new and old.
info.description:
Inspired by the brilliant works of https://www.writing.com/main/portfolio/view/fearboy Chaos, I’ve decided to give things my own spin, only this time with the focus on western cartoons.

The listed tags are mostly just guidelines. If you want some unbirth somewhere along a vore thread, feel free. I want people to be free to have fun, though I will be setting quality standards.

1) Please avoid one sentence chapters unless you follow them immediately with something more substantial.
2) You ought to have good grammar.
3) I maintain the right to alter the rules and make changes as need be.
4) I'll allow just about anything, especially vore related, though I'd prefer not to see scat or death.
5) Please include as many options as possible.

As an optional prompt, consider the idea of predators. As I've conceived them, they're a minority population with the ability to consume people in any way they like. Digestion is option, so they can just hold those they eat for a while and let them pass through to the end, or add their prey's nutrients to their growing bodies. Predators, or preds for short, have full legal immunity to eat whoever they want, and get away with quite a bit more if the writer so chooses. I'll leave any further details to you guys to think up.

This is just an optional prompt in case you need an idea on something to focus on.



Other than that, go wild.
info.pretty_title: Cartoon Vore, GTS, Shrink, and All Else
